c74object.name: mubu.knn
c74object.description:
K-nearest neighbor search on matrix data of a MuBu container's track using a kD-tree. The search can include matrix data of a given track over multiple buffers of a referred MuBu container. The buffers of the referred container that are included into kD-tree can be selected by the include and exclude messages. The object internally constructs a kD-tree from the included data.
The selection data is given as a float or list representing a scalar, vector or matrix corresponing to the matrix dimensions of the referred track. The kd-Tree search uses an Euklidian distance between the given selection data and the matrix data normalized by its standard deviation. Additionally, a weight can be defined for each matrix element (message weights) in order to scale their importance in the search.
As an option, the object can scale incoming selection data to the mean and standard deviation or to the minimum and maximum of the data included into the KNN search using the scaling attribute (typically applied to normalized input data). The minimum, maximum, mean and standard deviation calculated over the included data at the construction of the kD-tree can be output using the messages getmin, getmax, getmean, and getstddev.
By default, the kD-tree is not updated automatically when the track content changes, but can be updated using the update message. Initializing and changing the referred a MuBu container and/or track (messages and attributes mubuname, trackid, and refer) as well as setting the buffers included into the KNN search (messages include and exclude) automatically will cause the (re-)construction of the kD-tree. Since the constructing the kD-tree may represent a considerable amout of calcultaion, it is recommend to carefully choose the moment when the kD-tree is constructed.

attribute.name: k
attribute.digest: Maximum Number of Returned Neighbors (zero for all in radius)
attribute.description: Maximum Number of Returned Neighbors (zero for all in radius)

attribute.name: label
attribute.value: Maximum Number of Returned Neighbors (zero for all in radius)

method.name: int
method.description: Search neighbors of given values.

method.name: float
method.description: Select neighbors of given values.

method.name: bang
method.description: Reselect neighbors with same target.

method.name: list
method.description: Select neighbors of given values.

method.name: select
method.description: Set target at columns given by columns message, select nearest neighbors.

method.name: columns
method.description: Set target columns to use for select message, sets their weights to 1

method.name: getweights
method.description: Send current weights list out rightmost outlet

method.name: gettarget
method.description: Send current target list scaled from minmax out rightmost outlet

method.name: update
method.description: Update kD-tree with current track values.

method.name: include
method.description: Sets buffers (by index) that are included in the k-NN search and reconstructs the kD-tree (all other buffers of the referred MuBu container are excluded).

method.name: exclude
method.description: Sets buffers (by index) that are excluded from the k-NN search and reconstructs the kD-tree (all other buffers of the referred MuBu container are included).

method.name: getincluded
method.description: Outputs list of indices of buffers that are included in the k-NN search.

method.name: getexcluded
method.description: Outputs list of indices of buffers that are excluded from the k-NN search.

method.name: getnum
method.description: Outputs the total number of elements and the number of buffers included in the k-NN search.

method.name: getmin
method.description: Outputs the minima of the matrix data included in the k-NN search.

method.name: getmax
method.description: Outputs the maxima of the matrix data included in the k-NN search.

method.name: getrange
method.description: Outputs the range between minimum and maximum of the matrix data included in the k-NN search.

method.name: getmean
method.description: Outputs the mean values of the matrix data included in the k-NN search.

method.name: getmedian
method.description: Outputs the median values of the matrix data included in the k-NN search.

method.name: getstddev
method.description: Outputs the standard deviation of the matrix data included in the k-NN search
